sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Tabs, Tab, Button} from 'react-mdl'; import LogoPC from './images/pcIcon.png'; import PabloPicture from './images/PabloPic1Copy.png'; import Philips from './images/PhilipsIcon.png'; import Everis from './images/EverisIcon.png'; import Futury from './images/FuturyIcon.png'; import PCicon from './images/pcIcon.png'; import DocPDF from './Documents/PabloCanton-CV.pdf'; import UTicon from './images/UTicon.png'; import Aalto from './images/AaltoIcon.png'; import EITicon from './images/EITicon.png'; import UPMicon from './images/UPMicon.png'; import { Layout, Navigation, Content } from 'react-mdl'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import "fullpage.js/vendors/scrolloverflow"; // Optional. When using scrollOverflow:true import ReactFullpage from "@fullpage/react-fullpage"; class Projects extends React.Component { render() { return ( { return (

UX / UI Designer

"Design it till you make it"

Projects

fullpageApi.moveTo(2, 0)} style={{paddingLeft:'4vh'}}>

Resume

Pablo Cantón

Download Resume

Hi !

Nice to see you around here, I am Pablo Cantón, a multidisciplinary UX/UI Designer from Spain born in the 95. I design and develop innovatively IT solutions focus on the user experience, aiming for a positive impact on society. Considering my background I am really comfortable using designing software or implement design process, also coding as a backend or frontend. Keep scrolling for more information.

Experience

UX Designer

Currently

Integrate micro-learning into the daily life of blue-collar workers.

+ Info

UX Designer

6 months intern

Internship designing a digital dashboard to manage the team mood.

+ Info

CS Developer

1 year intern

Internship managing the databases of the client, Grupo IFA.

+ Info

Personal projects

4 years work

The compilation of all the mininfull project that I have been involved.

+ Info

UX Tools

Invision / FlowMap

Adobe Illustrator

Miro / Optimizely

UI Tools

WebFlow

Figma / Framer X

Balsamiq

Front-end

JavaScript / HTML / CSS

React / npm / Material UI

Android Studio / React Native

Back-end

Python / C / Java / R

Oracle SQL / SQL

FireBase / Google Developers

Studies

I&E

Minor

Innovation and Entrepreneurship minor from the EIT digital Master School.

+ Info

Intelligent Systems

Master

The second year of HCI & Design master, focus on Intelligent Systems.

+ Info

HCI & Design

Master

The first year of Human-Computer Interaction and Design master from the EIT.

+ Info

Computer Engineering

Bachelor

A 4-year bachelor degree at the Polytechnic University of Madrid.

+ Info

Feel free to contact:

pablocg1995@gmail.com

+34 676 32 80 05

linkedin.com/p-canton

github.com/p-canton

); }} /> ); } } export default Projects; /*
*/
